title: I cant get a S-rank chest!

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I have not yet got my s-rank chest for poppy{{champion:78}} , and i have one game where one of my premades got an s-rank, and another where i got an s-. I am really frustrated as i have a key and i was really looking forward to opening a chest. Does anyone know why this is happening? Btw, i linked my game history so ppl can see.

replies.body: It takes a little bit for our tools to update recent mastery scores, so I can't take a look into this just yet to see what happened.  If you earned that S we're happy to add the chest, but we'll want to take a closer look first.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll help you individually to figure this out!

> [{quoted}](name=DephyLive,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EFXQVhWs,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-26T18:40:51.432+0000)
>
> I have not yet got my s-rank chest for poppy{{champion:78}} , and i have one game where one of my premades got an s-rank, and another where i got an s-. I am really frustrated as i have a key and i was really looking forward to opening a chest. Does anyone know why this is happening? Btw, i linked my game history so ppl can see.

You alredy got chest with her, no matter what friends play with you if you have poppy with chest theres no more chance to you can take it. I have about 40 champs on 5+ mastery score and only 3 left where i can get chest. Try something else than poppy. 
And one more thing (tip), play some normal blind with some supp or tenk for example who is easy you will get chest than :)
Nope, i have not gotten my chest with her. Besides, these games are the only ones i ever played as poppy.
